items.name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Strike
items.description: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
items.effects: Summons red lightning that spreads from impact

items.name: Aspects Of The Crucible: Horns
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
items.effects: creates shoulder horn to gore foes from a low stance.

items.name: Agheel's Flame
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of the flying dragon Agheel.
items.effects: Spews flame breath of Agheel from above

items.name: Aspects Of The Crucible: Tail
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
items.effects: Creates supple tail to sweep area before caster

items.name: Barrier Of Gold
items.description: One of the incantations of Erdtree Worship.
items.effects: Greatly increases magic damage negation for self & allies

items.name: Ancient Dragons' Lightning Spear
items.description: A secret incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
items.effects: Stabs with red lightning spear from above

items.name: Beast Claw
items.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
items.effects: Creates claws that tear through the land.

items.name: Aspect Of The Crucible: Breath
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
items.effects: Creates throat pouch to spew fire while walking

items.name: Bestial Constitution
items.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
items.effects: Alleviates blood loss and frost buildup

items.name: Bestial Sling
items.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman. Swiftly flings a number of sharp rock shards. This incantation can be cast without delay after performing another action. It is said that in the time before the Erdtree, stones were the first weapons of the beasts who had gained intelligence.
items.effects: Swiftly flings numerous sharp rock shards

items.name: Black Blade
items.description: Power gleaned from the remembrance of Maliketh.
items.effects: Black blade spinning slash that emits wave of light.

items.name: Black Flame Ritual
items.description: Superior black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
items.effects: Summons circle of black flame pillars around caster.

items.name: Black Flame
items.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
items.effects: Throws a ball of raging black fire

items.name: Black Flame Blade
items.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
items.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with black flame

items.name: Bestial Vitality
items.description: Incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
items.effects: Heals HP over a period of time

items.name: Black Flame's Protection
items.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles.
items.effects: Increases phyiscal damage negation

items.name: Blessing's Boon
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
items.effects: Grants blessing to self and nearby allies

items.name: Blessing Of The Erdtree
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations
items.effects: Grants greater blessing to self and nearby allies

items.name: Bloodflame Blade
items.description: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood. Engulfs armament held in the right hand with bloodflame. This incantation can be cast while in motion. After dealing damage, bloodflame continues to build up onset of blood loss for a very short time.
items.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with bloodflame

items.name: Bloodflame Talons
items.description: A Blood Oath incantation, granted by the Lord of Blood.
items.effects: Creates bloodflame lacerations that then explode

items.name: Bloodboon
items.description: Sacred incantation of Mohg, Lord of Blood.
items.effects: Scatters bloodflame before caster to set area aflame.

items.name: Borealis's Mist
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Spews icy breath of Borealis from above

items.name: Cure Poison
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Cures Poison ailment and reduces poison build-up.

items.name: Burn O Flame!
items.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the
items.effects: Raises a series of flame pillars around caster

items.name: Darkness
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' servants, who once served as the
items.effects: Creates area of darkness that conceals caster

items.name: Death Lightning
items.description: Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon
items.effects: Strikes surroundings with storm of death lightning

items.name: Discus Of Light
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Fires ring of light before the caster

items.name: Divine Fortification
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Increases holy damage negation.

items.name: Dragonbolt Blessing
items.description: Superior incantation of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Summons lightning to bolster the caster's body. Attacks become easier to deflect and resistance to all ailments is increased. However, lightning damage negation will be reduced. Only those loved by dragons can survive the ordeal of cladding their bodies in lightning.
items.effects: Bolsters caster's body with lightning

items.name: Dragonice
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to spew icy breath

items.name: Dragonclaw
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to rend foes with dragon claws

items.name: Dragonfire
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to spew flame breath

items.name: Dragonmaw
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to bite foes before caster

items.name: Ekzyke's Decay
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Ekzykes, the Decaying.
items.effects: Spews scarlet rot breath of Ekzykes from above.

items.name: Fire's Deadly Sin
items.description: Incantation originating from a deeply ominous prophecy.
items.effects: Sets area and self ablaze with raging flames

items.name: Erdtree Heal
items.description: One of the ancient Erdtree incantations.
items.effects: Vastly heals HP for self and nearby allies

items.name: Flame, Fall Upon Them
items.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the
items.effects: Hurls several balls of fire at once

items.name: Electrify Armament
items.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
items.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with lightning damage

items.name: Flame Fortification
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Increases fire damage negation.

items.name: Flame Of The Fell God
items.description: This legendary incantation is one of several that draws directly from the power of the Fire Giants. Releases a ball of raging fire said to be inhabited by a fell god. The fireball floats toward enemies and explodes, setting the area ablaze. Arghanthy, the chief guardian of the Flame, had kept this incantation a well-kept secret until it was stolen by Adan. The fell god still lurks within the Fire Giants.
items.effects: Summons raging fireball that explodes and sets the area ablaze

items.name: Elden Stars
items.description: This legendary incantation is the most ancient of those that derive from the Erdtree.
items.effects: Creates a steam of golden shooting stars that assail the area.

items.name: Flame, Protect Me
items.description: The most ancient of the Fire Monks' incantations.
items.effects: Greatly increases fire damage negation

items.name: Fortissax's Lightning Spear
items.description: Incantation that channels the power of the ancient dragon Fortissax.
items.effects: Stabs from above with two red lightning spears in tandem

items.name: Frozen Lightning Spear
items.description: Incantation that channels the power of the Dragonkin Soldiers. Creates a spear of ice lightning and stabs it into the ground from above. On impact, the spear will burst into trails of lightning advancing forwards. The Dragonkin were born in the Eternal City, where they knew no true sky, nor true lightning. Instead, ice lightning was their weapon.
items.effects: Stabs with ice lightning spear from above

items.name: Glintstone Breath
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to spew icy breath.

items.name: Golden Lightning Fortification
items.description: An incantation of Erdtree Worship.
items.effects: Greatly increases lightning resistance for self and allies

items.name: Frenzied Burst
items.description: Incantations originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
items.effects: Emits concentrated blast of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes

items.name: Giantsflame Take Thee
items.description: One of the incantations that draws directly from the power of the
items.effects: Hurls massive ball of raging fire

items.name: Golden Vow (spell)
items.description: An incantation of Erdtree Worship.
items.effects: Increases attack and defense for self and allies

items.name: Gurrang's Beast Claw
items.description: Superior incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
items.effects: Creates beast claws to rend surroundings with shockwaves

items.name: Immutable Shield
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Increases left-hand shield's affinity/ailment resistance

items.name: Heal
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Heals HP for you and nearby allies.

items.name: Howl Of Shabriri
items.description: Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
items.effects: Shrieks, building up madness in nearby foes

items.name: Great Heal
items.description: Superior incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Greatly Heals HP for self and nearby allies

items.name: Greyoll's Roar
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of Greyoll, the Elder Dragon. An incantation of legendary status.
items.effects: Emits the roar of Elder Dragon Greyoll.

items.name: Inescapable Frenzy
items.description: Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
items.effects: Latches onto foes to spread madness

items.name: Honed Bolt
items.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
items.effects: Strikes foe with lightning bolt from above

items.name: Lansseax's Glaive
items.description: Incantation that channels the powr of the ancient dragon Lansseax.
items.effects: Sweeps from above with red lightning glaive.

items.name: Lightning Fortification
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Increass lighting damage negation

items.name: Lord's Aid
items.description: Incantation bestowed by the Two Fingers upon the Tarnished
items.effects: Alleviates poison / blood loss / sleep buildup for self / allies

items.name: Lightning Spear
items.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult. Summons a lightning spear and hurls it before the caster. Charging causes a lightning bolt to strike the point ofimpact. Long ago, Godwyn the Golden defeated the ancient dragon Fortissax, and befriended his fallen foe — an event that gave rise to the ancient dragon cult in the capital.
items.effects: Hurls lightning spear before caster

items.name: Law Of Causality
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Retaliates upon receiving a number of blows

items.name: Litany Of Proper Death
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Creates image of Order to deal holy damage

items.name: Law Of Regression
items.description: Incantation of the Golden Order fundamentalists. One of the key fundamentals. Heals all negative statuses, dispels special effects, and reveals mimicry in all its forms. The fundamentalists describe the Golden Order through the powers of regression and causality. Regression is the pull of meaning; that all things yearn eternally to converge.
items.effects: Heals all ailments and dispels all special effects

items.name: Lightning Strike
items.description: One of the incantations of the capital's ancient dragon cult.
items.effects: Summons lightning bolt that spreads from impact.

items.name: Lord's Divine Fortification
items.description: Incantation taught to Gideon the All-Knowing by the Two
items.effects: Greatly increases holy damage negation incl. allies

items.name: Lord's Heal
items.description: Incantation bestowed by the Two Fingers upon the Tarnished
items.effects: Massively heals HP for self and nearby allies

items.name: Order Healing
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Alleviates death blight buildup

items.name: Noble Presence
items.description: Ancient power of the Godskin Nobles.
items.effects: Thrust out belly with gusto to unelash repelling shockwave

items.name: Order's Blade
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. Used by hunters of Those Who Live in Death. Enchants armament held in the right hand with holy-affinity attacks. This incantation is especially damaging to Those Who Live in Death. Any felled by this incantation cannot be revived. The role of the hunters is to stamp out defiled reason - all for the perfection of the Golden Order.
items.effects: Enchanted right-hand armament with holy damage

items.name: Magic Fortification
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful. Increases magic damage negation. This incantation can be cast while in motion. Follow the path that has been set for you, and you will make enemies of all others: the monks, the sorcerers, the ancient dragon knights, and the scions of gold. Heed me – the Lands Between offers no welcome to the Tarnished.
items.effects: Increases magic damage negation

items.name: O, Flame!
items.description: Incantation of the Fire Monks.
items.effects: Momentarily sparks roaring flame from hand

items.name: Magma Breath
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels wyrm to spew magma breath

items.name: Pest Threads
items.description: Incantation of the servants of rot.
items.effects: Launches countless sticky threads before caster

items.name: Protection Of The Erdtree
items.description: A superior incantation of Erdtree Worship. Increase damage negation for all affinities except physical, for both the caster and nearby allies. Hold to continue praying and delay activation. In the beginning, everything was in opposition to the Erdtree. But through countless victories in war, it became the embodiment of Order.
items.effects: Increases affinity damage negation for self & allies

items.name: Poison Armament
items.description: Incantation of the servants of rot. Enchants armament held in the right hand with poison. This incantation can be cast while in motion. Those who dwell within poison know rot all too well. The death that begets life, that comes to all equally. That is to say: it is the cycle of rebirth put into practice.

items.name: Placidusax's Ruin
items.description: Power gleaned form the remembrance of Dragonlord Placidusax.
items.effects: Spews golden breath of Dragonlord Placidusax

items.name: Poison Mist
items.description: Incantation of the servants of rot.
items.effects: Releases poison mist before caster.

items.name: Radagon's Rings Of Light
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists.
items.effects: Creates golden ring of light to attack wide area

items.name: Rotten Breath
items.description: One of the incantations of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Channels dragon to spew scarlet rot breath

items.name: Rejection
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' faithful.
items.effects: Produces a shockwave that pushes away foes.

items.name: Smarag's Glintstone Breath
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion.
items.effects: Spews magic breath of Glintstone Dragon Smarag from above

items.name: Stone Of Gurranq
items.description: Superior incantation taught by Gurranq, the Beast Clergyman.
items.effects: Hurls a boulder before the caster

items.name: Surge, O Flame!
items.description: Superior incantation of the Fire Monks.
items.effects: Incinerates area before caster with stream of fire

items.name: Shadow Bait
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers' sewants, who once served as the
items.effects: Creates shadow that lures the aggression of foes of human build

items.name: Scouring Black Flame
items.description: A black flame incantation of the Godskin Apostles. Sweeps a wide area before the caster with black flame. Charging enhances range. The black flame could once slay gods. But when Maliketh sealed Destined Death, the true power of the black flame was lost.
items.effects: Sweeps area before caster with black flame

items.name: Scarlet Aeonia
items.description: Technique of Malenia, the Goddess of Rot.
items.effects: Creates a giant flower that explodes with scarlet rot.

items.name: Swarm Of Flies
items.description: A Blood Oath incantation, shared from the Lord of Blood's power. Releases a swarm of bloodflies before the caster to assault foes. The vile swarm deals damage and builds up onset of blood loss. This incantation can be cast while in motion. The new palace of the Lord of Blood lies in a swamp of festering blood, and these flies are said to spawn from excrement in that land.
items.effects: Releases a swarm of bloodflies before the caster

items.name: The Flame Of Frenzy
items.description: Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers.
items.effects: Emits burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes

items.name: Theodorix's Magma
items.description: Superior incantation of Dragon Communion. Channels the power of the great wyrm Theodorix. Transforms caster into a great wyrm to spew a large volume of magma breath. Allows one follow-up attack. The name of the ancient troll warrior Theodorix lives on — as a hero of the War against the Giants.
items.effects: Spews magma breath of Theodorix from above

items.name: Unendurable Frenzy
items.description: Incantation originating from the maddening Three Fingers. Causes the yellow flame of frenzy to violently burst forth from the caster's eyes. Hold to continue channeling the flame. This incantation can be used while in motion. It is the maddening pain and unstoppable tears of those afflicted with the flame of frenzy brought into being.
items.effects: Emits violent burst of yellow flame of frenzy from eyes.

items.name: Triple Rings Of Light
items.description: One of the incantations of the Golden Order fundamentalists. Produces three rings of light and fires them forwards. The rings of light return to a position close to the caster before disappearing. This incantation can be cast repeatedly. A gift from the young Ivliquella to his father, Radagon.
items.effects: Fire three rings of light before the caster

items.name: Whirl, O Flame!
items.description: Superior Incantation of the Fire Monks.
items.effects: Sweeps area before caster with stream of fire

items.name: Vyke's Dragonbolt
items.description: Incantation of Vyke, knight of the Roundtable Hold.
items.effects: Enchants right-hand armament with lightning damage

items.name: Urgent Heal
items.description: Incantation of the Two Fingers faithful.
items.effects: Heals a small amount of HP.

items.name: Wrath Of Gold
items.description: Superior Erdtree Worship incantation. Produces a golden shockwave that knocks back nearby foes. Charging increases the size of the shockwave. This incantation was discovered when the Elden Ring was shattered, and it was feared as a sign of the Erdtree's wrath.
items.effects: Produces golden shockwave that knocks back foes
